Type of issue: Axis of the slingshot not axed
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Touch the slingshot with the alien 3. The slingshot rolls
How to fix(if known): Block the axis of the slingshot

Type of issue: Slingshot can jump in the air
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over the slingshot 2. Use the capabilities of the slingshot 3. Use it again in the air
why?: The slingshot can makes multiple jumps
How to fix(if known): The slingshot needs to be fixed on the ground to jump

Type of issue: Remove the slow-motion when you get out of the slingshot
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over the slingshot. 2. Get out of it while you are in the air
why?: The player keep being slowed down when he gets out of the slingshot in the air
How to fix(if known): When you get out of the worm the state of the parasite is reset

Type of issue: Die when a "baril" touch you when you take over an alien
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Touch a barrel
why?: The player dies when he touches a barrel. However he doesn't if he touches one while he is an alien
How to fix(if known): The barrel can kill whoever the player is controlling

Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Jump right under the ceilling 3. Get out of the alien 4. You pass through the ceilling
why?: when you get out of the alien you are on top of it. if you are exactly under the ceilling you can pass through it
How to fix(if known): The parasite needs to get out of the alien exactly in the middle of the alien

Type of issue: Screen resolutions and ratios alterate the behavior of the game
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Try to jump
why?: The game doesn't work properly on some screen resolutions and ratios. Some jumps are impossible on bigger screens
How to fix(if known): Need to make a fix resolution and ratio

Type of issue: Screen resolutions and ratios change the camera
why?: The camera is too close to the player on big screns while it is too far on small screens
How to fix(if known): Need to make a fix resolution and ratio

Type of issue: Building the game in release mode remove the ability preview
Steps to reproduce: 1. Build the game in release mode. 2. Take over an alien. 3. Try to use an ability
why?: The ability preview is not shown because we use a debug function
How to fix(if known): Need to make the same function but for release mode

Type of issue: Non played aliens can make the player die
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Get out of it on the barrel's way 3. The barrel kills the player if it touches the alien
why?: The barrel can kill the player even if it doesn't touch the player
How to fix(if known): Need to make the barrel kill the player only if it touches the real player

Type of issue: The player can take over an alien in a place not intended to
Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the first level. 2. Jump over the laser and reach the "jumper"
How to fix(if known): Add a collider in front of the alien/Move the alien further
